Values.Value: PICK_ITEM Sunfish, Sardine, Flounder, Largemouth Bass, Halibut
PICK_ITEM Rainbow Trout, Dorado, Tilapia, Tuna, Red Mullet

Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.LadySheba_Text: There's a stray cat on East Scarp beach and she's hungry! Can someone give her some fish please? {FishType:Text} are her favourite! < Jas
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.LadySheba_Object: Place 5 {FishType:Text} in the crate by Scarp Beach
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.LadySheba2_Text: The stray cat's still hungry! Maybe some bug steak would help us make friends with her? < Jas
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.LadySheba2_Objec: Place 5 Bug Meat Steaks in the crate by Scarp Beach
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.LadySheba3_Text: She's almost ready to be my friend. And all cats love cheese! This time it's going to work, I'm sure of it. < Jas
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.LadySheba3_Objec: Place 3 pieces of cheese in the crate by Scarp Beach
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.AideenFlowers_Te: Spring is here, and I am in dire need of daffodils! If someone could deliver thirty fresh-picked flowers, they would have my eternal gratitude.     - Aideen
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.AideenFlowers_Ob: Deliver 15 Daffodils to the Vase in Aideen's Kitchen
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.AideenFlowers2_T: Now it is summer, sweet hearts are seeking sweet peas. I would be most grateful if someone could deliver thirty freshly picked blooms.   - Aideen
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.AideenFlowers2_O: Deliver 15 Sweet Peas to the Vase in Aideen's Kitchen
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.AideenFlowers3_T: Winter is so dreary, but flowers brighten even the most maudlin day. Help me brighten the lives of my customers, by delivering thirty freshly picked crocuses.    - Aideen
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.AideenFlowers3_O: Deliver 15 Crocuses to the Vase in Aideen's Kitchen
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.SlayCrabs_Text: Aggressive crabs are surfacing at night across East Scarp, threatening pets and wildlife. Please help us reduce this menace, and make East Scarp safe again.                     -Dr. Jacob (DVM)
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.JosephineJelly_T: I've been telling my friends back in Zuzu about the delicious local preserves, and now everyone wants some! I will pay generously for a dozen jars of jelly made from locally grown fruit   - Josephine.
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.JosephineJelly_O: Donate 12 jellies to the Inn fridge
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.BeatriceQuartz_T: Recent storms have damaged the lighthouse lens, and we need freshly smelted refined quartz for the repairs. If anybody could drop some by, please?     - Beatrice
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.BeatriceQuartz_O: Collect 12 freshly processed bars of refined quartz
Deliver 12 refined quartz to the Lighthouse
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.JojaCola_Text: Joja are running a competition with a CASH PRIZE! All you've got to do is distribute one case (that's 48 cans + 2 for luck!) to unsuspecting villagers.    'Joja Cola, Fuel your life!'    On yeah, and you can win 5000g so... totes worth a few frowns, right?
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.JacobCorn_Text: The Happy Hens' Sanctuary have been inundated with rescued chickens and are desperately in need of food donations. If anyone is able to supply me with corn, I'll pass it on to them.    - Dr. Jacob (DVM)
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.JacobCorn_Object: Place 30 corncobs in the delivery crate outside Jacob's House
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.JacobHay_Text: The Deja Moo Animal Sanctuary are in desperate need of hay to keep their hoofstock fed over winter, and I am collecting hay to donate to them. Please help!    - Dr. Jacob (DVM)
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.JacobHay_Objecti: Place 30 hay into the delivery crate outside Jacob's House
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.OliverSlime_Text: Hey... I showed a petrified slime to my RPG clan back in Zuzu  - and now they all want one! I need five, please. Can anyone help? Thanks! I'll pay you.
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.OliverSlime_Obje: Give five Petrified Slimes to Oliver.
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.OliverLexiSurpri: I want to bake a treat for a special friend of mine...  Rosa's said she'd help, but I need to supply the ingredients. Can someone help, please?    - Oliver
Place one egg in the ES Inn fridge
Place one bag of wheat flour in the ES Inn fridge
Place one bag of sugar in the ES Inn fridge
Place one fresh melon in the ES Inn fridge
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.EloiseJasJay_Tex: Jas has a blue jay friend called Jeremy and we want to help him feed his family! Blue jays love fresh sunflower seeds! Have you got any? I'll give you my pocket money.                               love, Eloise (and Jas)
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.EloiseRealMacaw_: Richie the Macaw's feeling a bit sad and hazlenuts will cheer him up. They're his favorite! Please bring a dozen to our house. But they've got to be fresh! ^Love, Eloise (and Richie)
Place 12 Hazelnuts in the vet clinic's donation bin.
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.ZUCUBoneCollecto: Research by the Zuzu City University Palentology Department indicates that the Stardew area is rich in natural history fossils. We are currently collecting samples from your neighborhood, with particular interest in animal bones and fossils. You will be compensated for your contribution.      - Prof. Cameron Peasbody

Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.AideenFlowers2Ma: Dear @, ^The sweet peas have certainly sweetened a few hearts. Thank you. In return, I am sending you something glorious for fall.^ Regards, Aideen.%item object {{spacechase0.jsonAssets/ObjectId:Fall Rose Starter}} 2 %%[#]Flower Delivery Thank You
Entries.EastScarp.SpecialOrders.AideenFlowers3Ma: Dear @, ^The crocuses have brightened many a dreary day. In gratitude, please find enclosed something beautiful for spring.^ Regards, Aideen.%item object {{spacechase0.jsonAssets/ObjectId:Spring Rose Starter}} 2 %%[#]Flower Delivery Thank You
